$interpreted: Sophie: When there's a smile, there's hope! We're Morgan's Marvelous Circus! Thanks to everyone for coming out to today's performance.
Sophie: (...It's already been so many days and we still haven't heard from Elio...)
Rune: Sophie?
Sophie: (Could it really be because of me that Elio...)
Sophie: (*sigh*...I'm such an idiot! Why did I tell him how I feel...?)
Rune: Sophie!
Sophie: Ah!
Sophie: Uh, is that it? Wait, when did it...
Rune: Just now. Sophie has been...looking tired. Sophie should...rest.
Sophie: Thanks for your concern Rune, but...
Rune: Find Elio?
Sophie: Yeah...let me put the props away and then we'll go look for him.
Rune: But...we have looked for so long. We can't...find him. Hanbei said...he left on his own.
Sophie: ...Maybe. But just in case, we should go look for him. I know I'm stubborn...
Rune: Rune...understands. I'll go with...Sophie.
Sophie: Huh?
Rune: Sophie is worried...about Elio. I'm worried...about Sophie. Let's...go together.
Sophie: What...what are you saying?
Rune: Did I...say something wrong?
Sophie: No...no, nothing.
Sophie: Rune, let's go.
Sophie: When I was counting tips, there was an audience member who said there was a Rune Master by the harbor fixing tools for money.
Sophie: I want to go see if it is Elio.
Angry Sailor: Blasted! The trash that those gosh darn rotten machines throw out all floats to the harbor!
Angry Sailor: Where in the hell did the Mechanical Territory transfer ship break down at? Making a man collect trash! What the hell do they take me for!?
Depressed Sailor: Hey, the commercial ships aren't willing to leave port because of the pirates. Us sailors can still make a living. We should be grinning, not complaining.
Angry Sailor: Grinning, my ass. I ain't happy!
Angry Sailor: If work on the harbor comes to a halt, we won't be able to make a living...
Sophie: Excuse me fellows, did you happen to see a short, young man who can use Rune magic around here?
Angry Sailor: Haven't seen 'em! Haven't seen nothing! Get outta the way!
Rune: Don't touch...Sophie!
Angry Sailor: I ain't feeling so good and I don't like you outsider humans! The Desert doesn't want you coming in and earning our money! Get the hell outta here!
Sophie: Oh...I was just asking if you'd seen Elio...
Sophie: Wow! When did you learn that move, Rune?
Rune: ...Learned from...Ru-yi...
Sophie: Incredible! It took months for Ru-yi to learn that move!
Sophie: Rune, are you okay? Does it hurt?
Rune: No pain...
Rune: ...A smile...suits Sophie...
Sophie: ......
Sophie: Yaa~It's all Rune's fault. Making me think of what happened five years ago.
Rune: ...My...fault...?
Sophie: Five years ago, my father...*sigh*...just left me here all alone when he passed away.
Sophie: I just kept crying, and crying, and crying...the rest of the troupe gathered in front of me and put on all these performances, forcing me to smile.
Rune: Everyone likes to see...Sophie smile.
Rune: Me...too.
Sophie: ......
Rune: Sophie?
Sophie: Yup, my dad used to say, "When you're down, you've got to laugh even harder!"
Sophie: ...But I really hate my dad.
Sophie: Alright!! Let's go find Elio with a smile on our faces!!

Model.Text: When there's a smile, there's hope! We're Morgan's Marvelous Circus! Thanks to everyone for coming out to today's performance.
(...It's already been so many days and we still haven't heard from Elio...)
Sophie?
(Could it really be because of me that Elio...)
(*sigh*...I'm such an idiot! Why did I tell him how I feel...?)
Sophie!
Ah!
Uh, is that it? Wait, when did it...
Just now. Sophie has been...looking tired. Sophie should...rest.
Thanks for your concern Rune, but...
Find Elio?
Yeah...let me put the props away and then we'll go look for him.
But...we have looked for so long. We can't...find him. Hanbei said...he left on his own.
...Maybe. But just in case, we should go look for him. I know I'm stubborn...
Rune...understands. I'll go with...Sophie.
Huh?
Sophie is worried...about Elio. I'm worried...about Sophie. Let's...go together.
What...what are you saying?
Did I...say something wrong?
No...no, nothing.
Rune, let's go.
When I was counting tips, there was an audience member who said there was a Rune Master by the harbor fixing tools for money.
I want to go see if it is Elio.
Blasted! The trash that those gosh darn rotten machines throw out all floats to the harbor!
Where in the hell did the Mechanical Territory transfer ship break down at? Making a man collect trash! What the hell do they take me for!?
Hey, the commercial ships aren't willing to leave port because of the pirates. Us sailors can still make a living. We should be grinning, not complaining.
Grinning, my ass. I ain't happy!
If work on the harbor comes to a halt, we won't be able to make a living...
Excuse me fellows, did you happen to see a short, young man who can use Rune magic around here?
Haven't seen 'em! Haven't seen nothing! Get outta the way!
Don't touch...Sophie!
I ain't feeling so good and I don't like you outsider humans! The Desert doesn't want you coming in and earning our money! Get the hell outta here!
Oh...I was just asking if you'd seen Elio...
Wow! When did you learn that move, Rune?
...Learned from...Ru-yi...
Incredible! It took months for Ru-yi to learn that move!
Rune, are you okay? Does it hurt?
No pain...
...A smile...suits Sophie...
Yaa~It's all Rune's fault. Making me think of what happened five years ago.
...My...fault...?
Five years ago, my father...*sigh*...just left me here all alone when he passed away.
I just kept crying, and crying, and crying...the rest of the troupe gathered in front of me and put on all these performances, forcing me to smile.
Everyone likes to see...Sophie smile.
Me...too.
Sophie?
Yup, my dad used to say, "When you're down, you've got to laugh even harder!"
...But I really hate my dad.
Alright!! Let's go find Elio with a smile on our faces!!
